payload.description: Update frontend/src/components/ui/mobile/index.js to export new mobile components (SwipeableBlock and UndoToast). Add named exports for these components to make them easily importable.
payload.context: Add: export { default as SwipeableBlock } from './SwipeableBlock'; and export { default as UndoToast } from './UndoToast'; or export { SwipeableBlock } from './SwipeableBlock' if using named export. Follow existing pattern in the file.
